channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Add to Feedly
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Add to Feedly

item.title: CVE-2023-2470|2024-08-02T06:26:08.544Z -- unknown -- add%20to%20feedly
item.description: The Add to Feedly WordPress plugin through 1.2.11 does not sanitize and escape its settings, allowing high-privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
